verses.verse: And it came to pass after <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%>, that one said <S%H559><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Behold <S%H1><s%>, thy father is sick <S%H2470><s%>: and he took <S%H3947><s%> with him his two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

And one told <S%H5046><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1121><s%>, thy son Joseph <S%H3130><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H3478><s%>: and Israel strengthened <S%H2388><s%> himself <S%H3427><s%>, and sat upon the bed <S%H4296><s%>.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, God <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto me at Luz <S%H3870><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and blessed me <S%H1288><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H6509><s%>, Behold, I will make thee fruitful, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> thee <S%H5414><s%>, and I will make of thee a company <S%H6951><s%> of peoples <S%H5971><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> this land <S%H776><s%> to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> after thee <S%H310><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> possession <S%H272><s%>.

And now thy two <S%H8147><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, who were born <S%H3205><s%> unto thee in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> before <S%H5704><s%> I came <S%H935><s%> unto thee into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, are mine <S%H669><s%>; Ephraim and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, even as Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, shall be mine.

And thy issue <S%H4138><s%>, that thou begettest <S%H3205><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H7121><s%>, shall be thine; they shall be called after <S%H5921><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their brethren <S%H251><s%> in their inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And as for me <S%H935><s%>, when I came from Paddan <S%H6307><s%>, Rachel <S%H7354><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> by me in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%>, when <S%H5750><s%> there was still some <S%H3530><s%> distance <S%H776><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> unto Ephrath <S%H672><s%>: and I buried her <S%H6912><s%> there in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Ephrath <S%H672><s%> (the same is Beth-lehem <S%H1035><s%>).
And Israel <S%H3478><s%> beheld <S%H7200><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Who are these?

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, They are my sons <S%H1121><s%>, whom God <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me here <S%H559><s%>. And he said, Bring them <S%H3947><s%>, I pray thee <S%H1288><s%>, unto me, and I will bless them.

Now the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were dim <S%H3513><s%> for age <S%H2207><s%>, so that he could <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%>. And he brought them near <S%H5066><s%> unto him <S%H5401><s%>; and he kissed them <S%H2263><s%>, and embraced them.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, I had not thought <S%H6419><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%>: and <S%H430><s%>, lo, God hath let me see <S%H7200><s%> thy seed also <S%H2233><s%>.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought them out <S%H3318><s%> from between <S%H5973><s%> his knees <S%H1290><s%>; and he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself with his face <S%H639><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them both <S%H8147><s%>, Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in his right hand <S%H3225><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s left hand <S%H8040><s%>, and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> in his left hand <S%H8040><s%> toward Israel <S%H3478><s%>'s right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and brought them near unto him <S%H5066><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> stretched out <S%H7971><s%> his right hand <S%H3225><s%>, and laid <S%H7896><s%> it upon Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>, who was the younger <S%H6810><s%>, and his left hand <S%H8040><s%> upon Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>, guiding <S%H7919><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> wittingly <S%H7919><s%>; for Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was the first-born <S%H1060><s%>.

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, The God <S%H430><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> whom my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%> did walk <S%H1980><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> who hath fed <S%H7462><s%> me all my life long <S%H5750><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>,

the angel <S%H4397><s%> who hath redeemed <S%H1350><s%> me from all evil <S%H7451><s%>, bless <S%H1288><s%> the lads <S%H5288><s%>; and let my name <S%H8034><s%> be named <S%H8034><s%> on them <S%H8034><s%>, and the name of my fathers <S%H1><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Isaac <S%H3327><s%>; and let them grow <S%H1711><s%> into a multitude <S%H7230><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that his father <S%H1><s%> laid <S%H7896><s%> his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, it displeased <S%H3415><s%> him <S%H8551><s%>: and he held up his father <S%H1><s%>'s hand <S%H3027><s%>, to remove <S%H5493><s%> it from Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%> unto Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>'s head <S%H7218><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, Not so <S%H1><s%>, my father; for this is the first-born <S%H1060><s%>; put <S%H7760><s%> thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>.

And his father <S%H1><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H1121><s%>, my son, I know <S%H3045><s%> it <S%H5971><s%>; he also shall become a people, and he also shall be great <S%H1431><s%>: howbeit <S%H199><s%> his younger <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> shall be greater <S%H1431><s%> than he <S%H2233><s%>, and his seed shall become a multitude <S%H4393><s%> of nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And he blessed <S%H1288><s%> them that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In thee will Israel <S%H3478><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> make <S%H7760><s%> thee as Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and as Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>: and he set <S%H7760><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Behold <S%H4191><s%>, I die: but God <S%H430><s%> will be with you <S%H7725><s%>, and bring you again unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Moreover I have given <S%H5414><s%> to thee one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H7926><s%> above thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, which I took <S%H3947><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> with my sword <S%H2719><s%> and with my bow <S%H7198><s%>.
